name: The Legend of Hope
description:
Den is awakening in empty room and trying to find his love Hope. But when he reaches her in his arms he appears at the start and have to try again and again. There must be end of the cycle but Den should be brave to FIGHT HIS FEARS.

W, A, S, D - movement

LMB - shoot

This game was made for weekly game jam 155, the theme of Cycle. But first of all I made this for my old good friend's birthday. Her name in english is Hope and she is awesome. 

Also I made a reference to Legend of Zelda coz I thought that the concept is similar and just for fun :)

Music - Pixel_Beats
